description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. It's the year 2012, take to the skies in an effort to liberate the  North Korean people from their ruthless dictator. Fight planes, ships, and subs in this exciting arcade style shooter.
description.short: It's the year 2012, take to the skies in an effort to liberate the  North Korean people from their ruthless dictator. Fight planes, ships, and subs in this exciting arcade style shooter.
